name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Senior Full Stack Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and **VueJS**, with robust skills in frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, and **Django**. Expertise in crafting AI-driven solutions, emphasizing predictive analytics and automation. Skilled in implementing CI/CD pipelines and microservices architecture, leveraging **Git**, **npm**, and build tools such as **Webpack**. Experienced with cloud platforms **AWS** and **Azure**, ensuring the deployment of cloud-native applications. Familiar with compliance-oriented development standards, including HIPAA and PCI DSS. Notable strengths in MLOps, employing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for model management and orchestration.
